articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Microsoft’s Mico is a ‘Clippy’ for the AI era - TechCrunch
articles.description: Microsoft has unveiled “Mico,” a new animated avatar for its Copilot AI that brings back shades of Clippy. The expressive blob acts as a friendly, customizable face for the chatbot.
articles.content: Microsoft has a new Clippy, and it’s an AI friend called Mico. At the company’s Copilot fall release press event on Thursday, the company introduced a range of new features and updates for its AI cha… [+3508 chars]

articles.author: Jyoti Mann
articles.title: Meta told some employees their jobs are being replaced by tech — read the memo - businessinsider.com
articles.description: An internal memo explaining the cuts said "many routine decisions can now be handled efficiently by technology."
articles.content:
Meta this week told staff in its risk division that a number of their roles were being eliminated because of improvements in the company's internal technology, Business Insider has learned.
